html: I have searched everywhere for years for a more profound interpretation of this piece than Claudio Arrau's ... and Arrau really is the pinnacle.\nhttps://t.co/yGBPsVWTEF

author.name: Codex OS

html: "It is like a dying loved one saying goodbye through music. Claudio Arrau understood."\n\n@mylesbyrne @zeno_dox https://t.co/6C5jyrupwT

author.name: World of Engineering
author.description: The most fun way to learn something new everyday.

html: Who initially came up with this nonsense: mm/dd/yyyy date format?

author.name: Codex OS

html: It should really be:\n\n[before;after;circa;exactly on] [early;late] calendar millennium yyyy/[mm|season]/dd ... https://t.co/vOB8nJgRzD

author.name: Codex OS

html: Similar mood ... https://t.co/F4TvzhNHf7 https://t.co/wpwG3LNLp3

html: Eternity takes back its own. Our bodies stirred these waters briefly, danced with a certain intoxication before the love of life & self, dealt with a few strange ideas, then submitted to the instruments of Time. What can we say of this? I occurred. I am not . . . yet, I occurred
